ygData.subject: Re: Weak Wizards?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know who to believe about this.  But I was chatting with a GM yesterday, and he kept repeating to everyone there that Wizards can deal more damage in
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know who to believe about this. But I was chatting with a GM
yesterday, and he kept repeating to everyone there that Wizards can deal
more damage in less time than any class in the game, regardless of level.
He also said that his level 50 wizard could do 4000 points in less than 20
seconds. Now, maybe he meant ice comet, I don't know. But no one I've
talked to has any problem with high level wizards, nor have I ever heard
anyone say they are weak. Until now, that is.



----- Original Message -----
From: RIVIERE STEPHANE <Stephane.Riviere@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 5:54 AM
Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Digest Number 152


>
> I am not sure you know how weak we are.... You tell about dd ? ok. Do you
> know that your best spel at level 50 only does 625 dommage ???? And that
the
> best dd spel for DRUID is 615 (and they buy it IN A FUCKING SHOP)????
> Magician get a BOLT who deal 900 dommage at level 49 (AND THEY BUY IT TOO
IN
> A FUCKING SHOP!)... ok it s a bolt so dificult to cast by WTF we must have
> the best dd spel no ????? With nearly the same mana/ratio.... Don t speak
> about ice comet, you never never will have it (unless you have 40 friend
> level 50 and who are ready to spare it with you...)... And oh yes : you
best
> dd spel is fire based so you can NOT hit fire giant (nothing in solusek b
in
> fact)and nagafen (who is one of the mob carrying the rune). So you use you
> level 39 sple at level 50.. that s pretty cool no ? At level 34 you have
a
> dd of 315 .. cool the magician have a bolt who deal 345 at 34 ...... So i
am
> sure you realise how weak we are right now :). People ask us to group ?
Yes
> cause they THINK we are the best dd caster... And it s not true at level
23
> you use a stupid level 16 spel. From 24 to 29 we are the best dd caster
yep.
> But from 34 to the end, no way we are nothing. I have one friend who is
> level 50 dark elfe on karana (menahemen a french speaking guy coming from
> suisse). He just stop playing at level 50 not because he don t like his
> wizzard cause he was really bored about what verant does to us (i mean we
> are undepowere dlike hell so we don t hit the major mob of the game as
> nagafen and lady vox :( ). Some of you may (again) tell me : ohh stop
> spaming, just play another classe if you don t like this one, we are fine
> with it... Ok wait till high level and we will see.. So np continue play
but
> never never hope to be (not the strongest) a regular class... Just hope to
> become the weakest class in the game but some like it ! (as i do :) )
>
>
> yakos
> level 26 wizzard karana
>
> p.s. a druid is 15 times more useful then me in a group.... People just
don
> t know we are so weak....
>
